A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Awful movie. Possibly ruined the franchise. I left the theater angry and upset with how one of the most beloved characters in cinema's story and death were presented. Absolute disgrace. Terrible plot\, weak writing\, and a total disregard for the Star Wars fan base. I can't believe this script was approved. IGNORE THE CRITICS REVIEWS. This is a bad film and the worst Star Wars movie.
